attributes.action: make premier league matches to be shown on bbc1/2, itv1 ch4 or five
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: premier league matches should be shown live on BBC1, BBC2, ITV1, CH4 or Five so that less unfortunate football fans who cannot afford the disgusting prices to attend matches or pay to watch it on sky sports/setanta sports can watch it
